insert into inquiry (inquiry_id, inquiry_sabangid, inquiry_type, inquiry_ansstate, inquiry_title, inquiry_writer, inquiry_date, inquiry_explain, inquiry_anscontent) values (#{inquiry_id}, #{inquiry_sabangid}, #{inquiry_type}, #{inquiry_ansstate}, #{inquiry_title}, #{inquiry_writer}, #{inquiry_date}, #{inquiry_explain}, #{inquiry_anscontent})
mapper.select: select inquiry_id, inquiry_sabangid, inquiry_type, inquiry_ansstate, inquiry_title, inquiry_writer, inquiry_date, inquiry_explain, inquiry_anscontent from inquiry order by inquiry_id desc

mapper.update: update inquiry set inquiry_sabangid=#{inquiry_sabangid}, inquiry_type=#{inquiry_type}, inquiry_ansstate=#{inquiry_ansstate}, inquiry_title=#{inquiry_title}, inquiry_writer=#{inquiry_writer}, inquiry_date=#{inquiry_date}, inquiry_explain=#{inquiry_explain}, inquiry_anscontent=#{inquiry_anscontent} where inquiry_id=#{inquiry_id}
